title: Western imperialism and nationalism in colonies

content.question: Which of the following was a significant effect of Western imperialism in the twentieth century?

choices.label: The decline of migrations to industrialized countries
The development of nationalism among colonized peoples
The conservation of the environment in colonized areas
The systematic deterioration in public health conditions

content.answer: The development of nationalism among colonized peoples

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
